sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Dynamically retrieves the input schema for the RFC, from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for the SAP S/4HANA – RFC spoke.
  • RFC Sys Id - SYS ID of the RFC record in SAP S/4HANA - RFC table.
  • RFC Name - Name of the RFC listed in SAP S/4HANA - RFC table.

Outputs :

  • Input Schema - Flattened JSON schema of input parameters (Import and Changing) for the selected RFC.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S/4HANA - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_S4HANA_RFC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Get RFC Input Schema

sys_translated_text.value:
Dynamically retrieve the input schema for the RFC, from SAP

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection Alias for SAP ECC - RFC.
  • RFC Sys Id - The SYS ID of the RFC record in SAP RFC Table.
  • RFC Name - Name of the RFC listed in SAP RFC Table.

 

Outputs :

  • Input Schema - The flattened JSON schema of input parameters (Import and Changing) for the selected RFC.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP ECC - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.

 

Error Messages :

  • Unknown Error. Check error log for more information.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP ECC - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_ECC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

 

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Dynamically retrieves the input schema for the RFC, from SAP S/4HANA - RFC.

Inputs :

  • Connection Alias - Connection alias for the SAP S/4HANA – RFC spoke.
  • RFC Sys Id - SYS ID of the RFC record in SAP S/4HANA - RFC table.
  • RFC Name - Name of the RFC listed in SAP S/4HANA - RFC table.

Outputs :

  • Input Schema - Flattened JSON schema of input parameters (Import and Changing) for the selected RFC.
  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in SAP S/4HANA - RFC, Status is set to “Error”.

 

To use this action, the corresponding SAP S/4HANA - RFC connection and credential must be created and associated with the SAP_S4HANA_RFC Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
